experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Tech Lead for implementation of stakeholder content on Vox owned sites from frontend to backend. Worked with clients and Product Manager, creating timeline objectives to measure and improve user engagement.
Upgraded and maintained Chorus API (500K+ requests/day), utilizing Apollo Federated GraphQL with Express to power editorial tools and headless CMS supporting all downstream services.
Overhauled legacy API Gateway with query testing and optimization in Apollo Studio, conversion to TypeScript, improving overall functionality.
Automated CI/CD pipeline using Terraform with GH Workflows, Helm Charts, Kubernetes to construct resources on AWS services: EKS, ECR, VPC, Route53, EC2, RDS, S3, Redis, ElastiCache.
Architected serverless event driven architecture in AWS through EventBridge, SQS, SNS, CloudWatch, Lambda.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Full Stack Software Engineer (Alpha Team) - Utilizing React and GraphQL, worked closely with UX Team, creating wireframes and user stories for complete rebuild of our enterprise access and identity management application.

Site Reliability Engineer (Charlie Team) - Facilitated the upgrade from Oracle 11G to Oracle 12C, utilized Ansible playbooks, Powershell and Python. Operated storage services for application: AWS ELK Stack, EC2, S3, RDS.

experience.title: Web Development Immersive Student
description: Web Development Immersive student at a full-stack web development program focused on common best practices in object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, data modeling, and test-driven development.

experience.title: Senior Program Manager
description: Led company-wide operations teams and increased annual number of contracts by 23% and overall revenue by ~27%.
Coordinated engineering efforts for new client-requested features.
Directed teams in conducting market research and data analysis for global clients: NBA, Condé Nast, NBC, CNN, FOX News, Time, Hearst.
Planned and developed Benchmark Database and individual client reports, delivering actionable metrics to clients.

experience.title: Business Teacher
description: Specialized in teaching Business English to Argentine and Brazilian executives to help them develop more impactful interactions with English speaking markets.

experience.title: Regional Coordinator
description: Captured ~70% of votes for NH’s largest voting region (comprised 30% of NH votes).
Presented candidate’s platforms with civic organizations and direct voter contact.
Developed and maintained extensive constituent database to augment outreach program for over 500 individuals.

experience.title: Marketing Degree
description: Recieved a Bachelor's Degree of Science, Marketing.
